程序包 encode

类 Switcher

java.lang.Object
components.Switcher
public class Switcher extends Object
作者:
Neolux Lee, neolux.lee@gmail.com

    字段
    说明
    private char[][]
    map
    If use no map, map[][] will have no use.

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    Switcher()
    Given no parameter, the Switcher won't change the input character.
    Switcher(boolean useMap)
    Given a boolean parameter, the boolean value will be viewed as useMap.
    Switcher(boolean useMap, char[][] map)
    Given a boolean and a 2D char array, we'll set the useMap and the map.
    Switcher(boolean useMap, int index)
    Given a boolean and an integer, We will set useMap with the boolean and set the map with integer.
    Switcher(int mode)
    Given an integer parameter, the mode will be viewed as the modification in the Caeser cipher.

  • 字段详细资料

    • useMap

      private boolean useMap
      whether use map or not.

    • mode

      private int mode
      If use no map, mode will be the modification of the Caeser cipher. If use a map, mode will have no use.

    • map

      private char[][] map
      If use no map, map[][] will have no use. If use a map, map[][] is the map.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Switcher

      public Switcher()
      Given no parameter, the Switcher won't change the input character.

    • Switcher

      public Switcher(int mode)
      Given an integer parameter, the mode will be viewed as the modification in the Caeser cipher.
      参数:
      mode -

    • Switcher

      public Switcher(boolean useMap)
      Given a boolean parameter, the boolean value will be viewed as useMap. And the map will be set to Map.maps[0].
      参数:
      useMap - Whether to use a map or not.

    • Switcher

      public Switcher(boolean useMap, int index)
      Given a boolean and an integer, We will set useMap with the boolean and set the map with integer.
      参数:
      useMap - Whether to use a map or not.
      index - To set the map to the index-th map in Map.maps

    • Switcher

      public Switcher(boolean useMap, char[][] map)
      Given a boolean and a 2D char array, we'll set the useMap and the map.
      参数:
      useMap - Whether to use a map or not.
      map - To set the map to map

  • 方法详细资料

    • setMode

      protected void setMode(int mode)
      Usually, you shouldn't change the mode value.
      参数:
      mode -

    • setMap

      public void setMap(boolean useMap)
      参数:
      useMap - A boolean value to make this Switcher whether a Caeser cipher or Mapping cipher.

    • setMap

      public void setMap(int index)
      From array of maps, set the map of this Switcher.
      参数:
      index - An index to set map from the array Switcher.Map.maps. If the useMap is false, this method won't make any difference.

    • setMap

      public void setMap(char[][] map)
      To manually set the map of this Switcher.
      参数:
      map -

    • encode

      public char encode(char c)
      Encrypt a character('a'-'z', 'A'-'Z') If the character is a special symbol, it won't be encrypted. Instead, this method will return the character itself.
      参数:
      c - The character before encryption.
      返回:
      Return the character after once encryption (Caeser or Mapping).

    • encode

      public char[] encode(String str)
      Encrypt a string. All alphabets in the string will be encrypted but all symbols and numbers won't be encrypted.
      参数:
      str - The string before the encryption.
      返回:
      the char array of the once encrypted string
